ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We created you so why do you not confirm the truth?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It is He who created you, then why do you not affirm the truth?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We have created you, then why would you not confirm it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is We who have created you. Why then did you not testify to the Truth?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It is We Who created you, so why do you not accept the truth?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: We created you, then why do you believe not
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: We have created you, why do you not then assent?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We created you; therefore why will you not believe?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We created you. Will ye then admit the truth?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We have created you: why then do you not accept the truth?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: We! it is We Who created you: wherefore confess ye not?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We created you. Then why do you not acknowledge it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It is We Who have created you: why will ye not witness the Truth?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: We created you, then why do you believe not?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We created you, why will you not believe!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We created you—if only you would believe!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: We have created you, so why do you not believe?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:57] We created you, We brought you into existence from nothing. Will you not then affirm [this] truth?, in resurrection? For the One able to create [from nothing] is also able to repeat [this creation].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (We created you) people of Mecca. (Will ye then admit the Truth) will you then believe in the Messenger?
